## FieldTextInput.getText\_() method

Use the `getText_` developer hook to override the field's text representation. When we're currently editing, return the current HTML value instead. Otherwise, return null which tells the field to use the default behaviour (which is a string cast of the field's value).  The HTML value if we're editing, otherwise null.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getText_(): string | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

string \| null
